short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: follow @friends or #hashtags -- discover & discuss WHAT'S HOT on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WHOT?! is a fun, new way to discover & share WHAT'S HOT on the web.  You can comment, upvote or downvote and #hashtag links using the extension while you browse the web. Follow friends and other WHOT?! users or subscribe to #hashtags and the things you're interested will show up in your feed.
